title: Trimming, early 19th century
medium: White, black, and colored silk in velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Two shields, each under a crown. One shows two trees (green and black on yellow).  The other shows armorial devices in blue within a red band ornamented with red castles.

tombstone.epitaph: Trimming, early 19th century. White, black, and colored silk in velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-61.
